verses.text: The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w*, \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, and \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, and \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*.\f + \fr 4.1 \ft Carmi: also called, Chelubai or Caleb\f*

And \w Reaiah|strong="H7211"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w*; and \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ahumai|strong="H0267"\w*, and \w Lahad|strong="H3855"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zorathites|strong="H6882"\w*.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft Reaiah: or, Haroeh\f*

And these \add were of\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*; \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and \w Ishma|strong="H3457"\w*, and \w Idbash|strong="H3031"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \add was\add* \w Hazelelponi|strong="H6753"\w*:

And \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*, and \w Ezer|strong="H5829"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Hushah|strong="H2364"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Ephratah|strong="H0672"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

¶ And \w Ashur|strong="H0806"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Helah|strong="H2458"\w* and \w Naarah|strong="H5292"\w*.

And \w Naarah|strong="H5292"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Ahuzam|strong="H0275"\w*, and \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, and \w Temeni|strong="H8488"\w*, and \w Haahashtari|strong="H0326"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naarah|strong="H5292"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helah|strong="H2458"\w* \add were\add*, \w Zereth|strong="H6889"\w*, and \w Jezoar|strong="H6714"\w*, and \w Ethnan|strong="H0869"\w*.

And \w Coz|strong="H6976"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Anub|strong="H6036"\w*, and \w Zobebah|strong="H6637"\w*, and the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Aharhel|strong="H0316"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harum|strong="H2037"\w*.

¶ And \w Jabez|strong="H3258"\w* was more \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* than his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jabez|strong="H3258"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Because I \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him with \w sorrow|strong="H6090"\w*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft Jabez: that is, Sorrowful\f*

And \w Jabez|strong="H3258"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Oh \w that|strong="H0518"\w* thou wouldest \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* me \w indeed|strong="H1288"\w*, and \w enlarge|strong="H7235"\w* my \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*, and that thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* might be with me, and that thou wouldest \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \add me\add* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, that it may not \w grieve|strong="H6087"\w* me! And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w granted|strong="H0935"\w* him that which he \w requested|strong="H7592"\w*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft Oh…: Heb. If thou wilt, etc\f*\f + \fr 4.10 \ft keep…: Heb. do me\f*

¶ And \w Chelub|strong="H3620"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Shuah|strong="H7746"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Mehir|strong="H4243"\w*, which \add was\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Eshton|strong="H0850"\w*.

And \w Eshton|strong="H0850"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Beth-rapha|strong="H1051"\w*, and \w Paseah|strong="H6454"\w*, and \w Tehinnah|strong="H8468"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Ir-nahash|strong="H5904"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Rechah|strong="H7397"\w*.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft Ir-nahash: or, the city of Nahash\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*; \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w*, and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w*; \w Hathath|strong="H2867"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft Hathath…: or, Hathath, and Meonothai, who begat, etc\f*

And \w Meonothai|strong="H4587"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*: and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Charashim|strong="H2798"\w*; for they were \w craftsmen|strong="H2791"\w*.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft valley: or, inhabitants of the valley\f*\f + \fr 4.14 \ft Charashim: that is, craftsmen\f*\f + \fr 4.14 \ft Hathath…: or, Hathath, and Meonothai, who begat, etc\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*; \w Iru|strong="H5900"\w*, \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, and \w Naam|strong="H5277"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, even \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*.\f + \fr 4.15 \ft even Kenaz: or, Uknaz\f*
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehaleleel|strong="H3094"\w*; \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*, and \w Ziphah|strong="H2129"\w*, \w Tiria|strong="H8493"\w*, and \w Asareel|strong="H0840"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ezra|strong="H5834"\w* \add were\add*, \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*, and \w Mered|strong="H4778"\w*, and \w Epher|strong="H6081"\w*, and \w Jalon|strong="H3210"\w*: and she \w bare|strong="H2029"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, and \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w*, and \w Ishbah|strong="H3431"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Eshtemoa|strong="H0851"\w*.

And his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Jehudijah|strong="H3057"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jered|strong="H3382"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*, and \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Socho|strong="H7755"\w*, and \w Jekuthiel|strong="H3354"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Zanoah|strong="H2182"\w*. And these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bithiah|strong="H1332"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, which \w Mered|strong="H4778"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w*.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft Jehudijah: or, the Jewess\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \add his\add* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Hodiah|strong="H1940"\w* the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Naham|strong="H5163"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w* the \w Garmite|strong="H1636"\w*, and \w Eshtemoa|strong="H0851"\w* the \w Maachathite|strong="H4602"\w*.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft Hodiah: or, Jehudijah, mentioned before\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimon|strong="H7889"\w* \add were\add*, \w Amnon|strong="H0550"\w*, and \w Rinnah|strong="H7441"\w*, \w Ben-hanan|strong="H1135"\w*, and \w Tilon|strong="H8436"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ishi|strong="H3469"\w* \add were\add*, \w Zoheth|strong="H2105"\w*, and \w Ben-zoheth|strong="H1132"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add were\add*, \w Er|strong="H6147"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Lecah|strong="H3922"\w*, and \w Laadah|strong="H3935"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*, and the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of them that \w wrought|strong="H5656"\w* fine \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ashbea|strong="H0791"\w*,

And \w Jokim|strong="H3137"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Chozeba|strong="H3578"\w*, and \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, and \w Saraph|strong="H8315"\w*, who had the \w dominion|strong="H1166"\w* in \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w Jashubi-lehem|strong="H3433"\w*. And \add these are\add* \w ancient|strong="H6267"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*.

These \add were\add* the \w potters|strong="H3335"\w*, and those that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* among \w plants|strong="H5196"\w* and \w hedges|strong="H1448"\w*: there they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* for his \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \add were\add*, \w Nemuel|strong="H5241"\w*, and \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, \w Jarib|strong="H3402"\w*, \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \add and\add* \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w*:\f + \fr 4.24 \ft Nemuel: or, Jemuel\f*\f + \fr 4.24 \ft Jarib, Zerah: or, Jachin Zohar\f*
\w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Mibsam|strong="H4017"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Mishma|strong="H4927"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mishma|strong="H4927"\w*; \w Hamuel|strong="H2536"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Zacchur|strong="H2139"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* had \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; but his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* had not \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, neither did all their \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*, like to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 4.27 \ft like…: Heb. unto\f*
And they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, and \w Moladah|strong="H4137"\w*, and \w Hazar-shual|strong="H2705"\w*,
And at \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w*, and at \w Ezem|strong="H6107"\w*, and at \w Tolad|strong="H8434"\w*,\f + \fr 4.29 \ft Bilhah: or, Balah\f*\f + \fr 4.29 \ft Tolad: or, Eltolad\f*
And at \w Bethuel|strong="H1328"\w*, and at \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*, and at \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*,

And at \w Beth-marcaboth|strong="H1024"\w*, and \w Hazar-susim|strong="H2702"\w*, and at \w Beth-birei|strong="H1011"\w*, and at \w Shaaraim|strong="H8189"\w*. These \add were\add* their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* unto the \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 4.31 \ft Hazar-susim: or, Hazar-susah\f*

And their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* \add were\add*, \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*, and \w Ain|strong="H5871"\w*, \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*, and \w Tochen|strong="H8507"\w*, and \w Ashan|strong="H6228"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*:\f + \fr 4.32 \ft Etam: or, Ether\f*

And all their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* that \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the same \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*. These \add were\add* their \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w*, and their \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w*.\f + \fr 4.33 \ft Baal: or, Baalath-beer\f*\f + \fr 4.33 \ft their genealogy: or, as they divided themselves by nations among them\f*
And \w Meshobab|strong="H4877"\w*, and \w Jamlech|strong="H3230"\w*, and \w Joshah|strong="H3144"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*,

And \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, and \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josibiah|strong="H3143"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asiel|strong="H6221"\w*,

And \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, and \w Jaakobah|strong="H3291"\w*, and \w Jeshohaiah|strong="H3439"\w*, and \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w*, and \w Adiel|strong="H5717"\w*, and \w Jesimiel|strong="H3450"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*,

And \w Ziza|strong="H2124"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shiphi|strong="H8230"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Allon|strong="H0438"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jedaiah|strong="H3042"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimri|strong="H8113"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*;

These \w mentioned|strong="H0935"\w* by \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \add were\add* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* in their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w increased|strong="H6555"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 4.38 \ft mentioned: Heb. coming\f*

¶ And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w entrance|strong="H3996"\w* of \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*, \add even\add* unto the east \w side|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* for their \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

And they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* and \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add was\add* \w wide|strong="H7342"\w*, and \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, and \w peaceable|strong="H7961"\w*; for \add they\add* of \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w* had \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* there of \w old|strong="H6440"\w*.

And these \w written|strong="H3789"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and the \w habitations|strong="H4583"\w* that were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* there, and \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* them utterly unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their rooms: because \add there was\add* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* there for their \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

And \add some\add* of them, \add even\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, having for their \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w Pelatiah|strong="H6410"\w*, and \w Neariah|strong="H5294"\w*, and \w Rephaiah|strong="H7509"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ishi|strong="H3469"\w*.

And they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w rest|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* that were \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* there unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
